alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lowndes; Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:29AM CDT until June 14 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Oktibbeha County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Clay County in northeastern Mississippi... Central Lowndes County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 228 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tibbee, or near West Point, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bent Oak around 235 AM CDT. Waverly around 245 AM CDT. Columbus around 250 AM CDT. Columbus AFB around 255 AM CDT. Steens around 300 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
